title: webOS - Mac Inspired UI
description: A macOS-inspired web-based operating system interface built using modern JavaScript and DOM manipulation.

title: FocusFlow - Productivity Dashboard
description: A productivity dashboard featuring Pomodoro timer, to-do list, daily tasks, and motivational quotes.

title: FinTrack - Personal Finance Tracker
description: A finance tracking application that visualizes spending habits using interactive charts and analytics.

title: SecureAuth - Backend Identity Service
description: A secure backend authentication system with JWT-based login, role-based access control, and encryption.

title: ImageLab - Web Image Editor
description: A browser-based image editor with filters, presets, real-time canvas manipulation, and download support.

title: DevBoard - Project Management Tool
description: A lightweight project management web application featuring task boards, drag-and-drop support, and team collaboration tools.
